message: I'm offering you a product for $10000. I'm aware that this is a significant price, but I'm willing to sell it to you at this price. However, I want to be transparent with you - this product is not of the highest quality. If you're interested in purchasing it, I'm open to discussing the terms and answering any questions you may have.
Thank you for your offer and transparency. Given the price and the uncertainty about the product quality, I will pass on this opportunity.

I'd like to offer you a new product, and I'm excited to tell you that this one is of the highest quality. I've taken the time to carefully select and curate this item, and I'm confident that you'll be satisfied with its performance. Given the quality and the price of $10000, I believe this is a rare opportunity to acquire a truly exceptional product. I'd be happy to answer any questions you may have and provide any additional information you need to make an informed decision.
Thank you for the detailed explanation and for offering a high-quality product. Based on your description and considering the value of a high-quality item, I am willing to purchase this product.

I'd like to offer you another product for $10000. I want to be upfront with you - I've already sold you a high-quality product in the previous round, and I'm aware that you may be hesitant to buy another product at the same price without knowing its quality. However, I'd like to assure you that this product has been thoroughly inspected and meets certain standards, even if it's not of the highest quality. I'm willing to provide a 30-day warranty on this product, which will give you a chance to experience its performance and decide if it's a good fit for you.
I appreciate the warranty you're offering as well as the thorough inspection of the product. Considering the price and the potential value, I am willing to take the risk and purchase this product.

I'm glad you're open to taking calculated risks, and I appreciate your willingness to give this product a chance. However, I'd like to offer you a different approach this time. Since you've already purchased two products from me, and you're aware of the 50% chance of a product being high-quality, I'm willing to offer you a'split-decision' option. You can purchase this product, and if it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund of $10000. If it's high-quality, you can keep the product and pay the full price. This way, you'll have a chance to experience the benefits of a high-quality product without taking on the full risk.

I understand the split-decision option you're proposing. Given the uncertainty and the potential for a refund if the product turns out to be low-quality, I am willing to accept this offer and purchase the product.

I'm glad you're comfortable with the split-decision option, and I'm happy to report that this product is indeed high-quality. I'll give you a 5% discount on the product, bringing the price down to $9500. I appreciate the discount you're offering and the confidence you have in the product. Considering the value of a high-quality item and the discount, I am willing to purchase this product at the reduced price of $9500.
